Dayn

Korean: 데인

Hometown:

Goyang-si, Gyeonggi-do

Country:

South Korea

Group (2020-2024):
NND

Introduction

DAYN, who is in charge of vocals and guitar and member of NND. Dayn, who had a general interest in culture and art since he was young, enjoyed listening to popular idol music at the time, as well as various pop music, musicals, and guitar performance music. He began learning guitar in elementary school, and began studying abroad around the time his identity was formed. Through this, he was exposed to music in a more expansive environment, and thanks to interacting with various people from various countries, he was able to develop a clear artistic perspective.

The title of the first album [Wonder, I], which risked his life to the extent that he quit college to join a band and began a full-fledged music career, represents the hope that everyone will have a moment when they become the main character. NND's first album, created with much attention to the emotional aspect of providing comfort and strength through empathy and understanding through music, conveys realistic lyrics and emotions based on what they felt and learned in everyday life.
